name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Shenzhen, Guangdong, a man named Shi Jiaokun posted a video saying that the Xuzhou police went to Shenzhen for deep-sea fishing and robbed the company property of his eldest son Wang Wei and second son Shi Yihua. Because the Shenzhen police refused to cooperate with the Xuzhou police in the arrest, the Xuzhou police followed Wang Wei and secretly arrested him in the suburbs. After receiving the alarm, the Shenzhen police stopped it in time, so the Xuzhou police failed.
In order to convict the two, the Xuzhou police copied a file called "Grand Theft Auto" to the hard drive of Wang Wei's company, claiming that it was a data file of Wang Wei's company and accused them.
During the case, the Xuzhou police kept asking Wang Wei and Shi Yihua for 500,000 yuan. Because they only paid 100,000 yuan, they were retaliated by the Xuzhou police and the files were heavily modified.
The court sentenced Wang Wei to 7 years in prison and Shi Yihua to 4 years in prison based on the false evidence produced by the Xuzhou police. And the company's property was also confiscated by the court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The incident of Dang Changxin, a student at Pucheng Vocational School, falling from a building has attracted attention. An insider said that before falling from the building, Dang Changxin was bullied by many classmates, and one of the bullies was suspected to be the principal's nephew. Dang Changxin was suspected to have been pushed down the building after being bullied. After the incident, the head teacher confiscated the student's mobile phone and deleted the video. The school principal fled early, leaving the vice principal and director to take over.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
Civil servants in Shifang, Sichuan Province have confirmed a salary increase, from "maintaining 6 and striving for 8" to an average increase of 500 yuan per month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Japanese netizen said that his account was blocked because a Winnie the Pooh avatar appeared in the video he uploaded to Bilibili.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, China Consumer News reported that a Russian specialty product store in Fujian was found to be selling products without a factory address or name, illegally falsely advertising the health benefits of honey for nourishing the stomach and replenishing the body, and mixing domestic and imported foods.
On January 8, Yangcheng Evening News reported that most of the Russian national pavilions on the market are fake, and there are only four Russian authorized stores in China, located in Shanghai, Harbin, Chengdu and Shenzhen

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A statue of Mao Zedong in a temple in Shangqiu, Henan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a company posted a video on Douyin to recruit Taiwanese people to settle in Xiamen. The video said: Taiwanese people do not need to give up their Taiwanese nationality to obtain a mainland resident ID card starting with 352 (not a Taiwan resident residence permit, which is the same as the front and back of a mainland resident ID card), a household registration booklet and even a Chinese passport, and can also apply for a Hong Kong and Macau Pass.
The video it posted shows that many people have applied for and hold red Chinese passports, green Taiwanese passports, and ID cards from both countries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection propaganda film "Anti-corruption for the People" once again reported a common phenomenon: the case of statistical fraud during Sun Shutao's tenure as secretary of the Weihai Municipal Party Committee.
Before 2012, Weihai's GDP growth rate always ranked low among all cities in the province, but as soon as Sun Shutao became the municipal party committee secretary, the ranking rose sharply to 7th in 2013, and jumped to 2nd in 2015, and remained in 3rd in 2016 and 2017. In 2018, Sun Shutao was transferred from Weihai, and the ranking fell back to 13th
According to the National Bureau of Statistics, from 2013 to 2017, the statistical data of industrial enterprises above designated size in Weihai were seriously falsely reported, and many enterprises reported that they were interfered with by relevant local departments in the process of submitting statistical data.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution January 8 Dozens of Aijia maternity centers in many places across the country ran away overnight, and a large number of consumers went to the stores to defend their rights. A large number of police officers were dispatched in Suzhou to maintain stability. A mother had just given birth to a child when the maternity center ran away. The mother cried and begged the aunt to stay because the elderly at home were not at home and she didn't know how to take care of the child.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a parent in Kunshan, Jiangsu Province posted a message asking for help. His son died of sudden cardiac death less than half a year after entering Kunshan Kuncheng Foreign Language School.
The school has a very high learning intensity, requiring students to get up at 6:30 every morning and leave the dormitory at 7:10. It is stipulated that the lights should be turned off at 10 o'clock, but his son did not return to the dormitory at 11 o'clock in the evening a few days before the incident.
Moreover, the school doctor was actually a nurse, and the AED was not brought to the scene until more than ten minutes after the abnormality was discovered, completely missing the rescue time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 8, Xi'an announced blood donation regulations: If the cumulative blood donation exceeds 1,000 milliliters, unlimited free blood can be used for life. Netizens in the comment area expressed disbelief: "Credit collapse" and "Chinese people don't cheat Chinese people." There have been many related discussions on Zhihu: "Blood donation certificates from other places are not recognized", "Blood donation certificates for more than half a year are not recognized", "Blood donation certificates without new blood donation certificates are not allowed to be used." There is even a profession of blood donation certificate dealers, and family members need to buy recent blood donation certificates to use blood in surgery

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Nezha Auto founder Fang Yunzhou restricted from high consumption
Recently, due to failure to perform the payment obligations determined by the effective legal documents within the period specified in the execution notice, Beijing Zhehe New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. and its legal representative Fang Yunzhou were restricted from high consumption. This involved a labor dispute case, and the execution court was the Chaoyang District People's Court of Beijing. The case process information shows that in December last year, Beijing Zhehe New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. had been forcibly executed for 22,000 yuan in this case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tourists skiing in Aoshan, Taibai County, Baoji, Shaanxi Province found that some fields (B cableway) were not open, so they protested collectively on the spot, demanding to see the person in charge and shouting for a refund.
The person in charge of the ski resort said on the spot: All procedures are complete and legal, but the government does not allow that part of the cableway to be opened.
Tourists protesting on the spot: If you don’t open the cableway, then we will open the cableway ourselves
Finally, the tourists collectively pushed down the guardrail blocking the cableway

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 7th, Nanyang, Henan, Jiankong Group Tanghe Jiangshanhui workers have not received their wages for three years, and they gathered again to demand their wages
January 7th, Hefei, Anhui, Shushan High-tech Zone, Xiaomiao Town, workers gathered at the Longhu Real Estate office to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6th, Xibao Village, Baoji, Shaanxi Province: Villagers gathered in front of the village committee’s Party and Mass Service Center to defend their rights and demanded that the village committee disclose the financial and land transfer contracts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 8th, the boss of Aijia Maternity Center ran away. Consumers and employees in many places across the country defended their rights. Some pregnant women who defended their rights were taken away by police buses.
Shanghai Aijia Maternity Center ran away. Pregnant women and their families defended their rights. A large number of police rushed to the scene. The police said that these pregnant women were obstructing public affairs. In the end, all pregnant women and their families were taken away by police buses.
The maternity centers in Guangzhou were crowded with pregnant women who defended their rights. Many pregnant women had paid the full amount of more than 25,800 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 8, many maternity centers in many places across the country collapsed and ran away.
The boss of Shanghai Aijia Maternity Center ran away. Employees jumped off the building to defend their rights, and were finally taken away by the police.
Hangzhou Aijia Maternity Center ran away. The salesperson was still urging customers to pay the money the day before yesterday, and the next day it collapsed and ran away with the money.
The boss of Guangdong Foshan Meiyue Maternity Center ran away. Employees gathered at the door to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Aijia maternity centers in Nanjing and Suzhou have all run away, and customers and employees are seeking their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 8, Zhejiang. A man called the mayor's hotline to ask what conditions are needed to establish a new party to serve the people.
Staff: We have never received such consultation and cannot answer.
Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, actor Wang Xing lost contact at the Thai-Myanmar border, which attracted attention. Wang Xing said that he was locked up in a building with 50 Chinese people.
In response, netizens left messages in the comment section of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs Spokesperson's Office account, calling on the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to rescue other trapped Chinese people: "Can't the sixth-generation fighter jets rescue them?" "How to solve the Myawaddy KK Park fraud"
The official account of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has enabled "Author only allows fans to comment"
